DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose study well understand investigator previously develop decision support ( DS ) tool help people make decision health insurance plan available federal exchange create Affordable Care Act ( ACA ) . The investigator evaluate DS tool compare federal government website . The investigator also evaluate feasibility disseminate tool . There two primary aim complete project : ( 1 ) examine reach effectiveness health insurance DS tool ; ( 2 ) collect stakeholder ' feedback improve likelihood implementation DS tool .
DOC.brief_title: Supporting Decisions About Health Insurance Improve Care Uninsured
DOC.detailed_description: First , Aim 1 part 1 , investigator recruit 40 key stakeholder ( uninsured participant , health provider , community advisor , health policy expert ) refine DS tool series individual semi-structured interview . Next , investigator use feedback program DS strategies online DS tool . After initial production , tool pilot test 30 individual assess readability , message clarity , format , function tool well test randomize trial study procedure . Then , Aim 1 part 2 , investigator test DS tool randomize trial 362 participant eligible Affordable Care Act ( ACA ) exchange . Half use DS tool half use federal government site learn exchange . The investigator use computerized random assignment assign participant study condition , complete short survey . For Aim 2 , investigator collect 40 stakeholder ' feedback likelihood adoption implementation DS tool plan dissemination implementation . Stakeholders ask open-ended closed-ended question order gather feedback deliver DS tool . These stakeholder different interview Aim 1 ensure broad applicability DS tool .
DOC.criteria: Must without health insurance currently ; Must enrol one ACA exchange plan past 1 year ; Must speak English Currently health insurance provide enrol one ACA exchange plan past year Currently health insurance provide public insurance private employerbased insurance Does speak English
